tool_description: Generates intermediate waypoints between start and end poses using specified interpolation methods for path planning.

num_points.description: Number of intermediate waypoints to generate

interpolation_method.description: Interpolation type: linear, cubic, quintic, slerp

include_endpoints.description: Whether to include start and end poses in output

error_messages: Invalid pose format: Start and end poses must each contain exactly 7 values.
Invalid point count: num_points must be between 2 and 1000.
Unsupported interpolation: Use linear, cubic, quintic, or slerp.
Invalid quaternions: Quaternions in poses must be normalized.
usage: Specify start_pose, end_pose, num_points, and optional interpolation_method. Returns array of intermediate waypoints.

waypoints.description: Generated waypoints as flattened array of 7-element poses

path_length.description: Total Cartesian path length in meters
